item.description:
@Illadelph wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:4, topic:472069”][quote author=Forsakinpkers link=topic=589760.msg4176913#msg4176913 date=1355090046]
ok it worked but when i click it, it teleports me befor i click the option like zoo. it just teleports me befor i click a option
[/quote]
Did you ever check your config file to see if the teleports were being handled there…[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Teleport Command
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Forsakinpkers, post:1, topic:472069”]ok so i am trying to get it when you click on a teleport it gives you options to teleport to i have this command.

		case 4140: //varrock
		if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(563,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(554,1) && c.getItems().playerHasItem(556,3)) {
			c.getPA().startTeleport(3093, 3493, 0, "modern");
			c.sendOption4("mage Bank");

my teleports only work in clickingbuttions
my source is PI 317[/quote]
Why the hell did you make another topic on this?
You already had one.
you’d want to change this:

 c.getPA().startTeleport(3093, 3493, 0, "modern");
            c.sendOption4("mage Bank");

to:

c.getDH().sendOptionX(Options here);

Here’s an example:

c.getDH().sendOption5("Home", "Zoo", "DonorZone", "Random", "More Options");

There’s sendOption1, sendOption2, sendOption3, sendOption4, and sendOption5.

Read full topic
